description: Commands to manage Azure Cache for Redis bindings.

commands.name: az spring-cloud app binding redis add
commands.summary: Bind an Azure Cache for Redis with the app.
commands.syntax:
az spring-cloud app binding redis add --app
                                      --name
                                      --resource-group
                                      --resource-id
                                      --service
                                      [--disable-ssl {false, true}]

commands.name: az spring-cloud app binding redis update
commands.summary: Update an Azure Cache for Redis service binding of the app.
commands.syntax:
az spring-cloud app binding redis update --app
                                         --name
                                         --resource-group
                                         --service
                                         [--disable-ssl {false, true}]
